testCases.label: Verify retrieveVector returns correct word vector
testCases.description: Checks that retrieveVector returns the exact pretrained Word2Vec vector for a known word ('cat').

testCases.label: Verify retrieveVector returns -1 for unknown word
testCases.description: Ensures that retrieveVector returns -1 when requesting a vector for an out-of-vocabulary word ('revature').

testCases.label: Verify similarPairExercise returns similarity above threshold
testCases.description: Checks that the similarity score computed in similarPairExercise is greater than 0.4, confirming semantic similarity handling.

testCases.label: Verify retrieveSimilarWordsExercise respects limit
testCases.description: Ensures that retrieveSimilarWordsExercise returns a list of similar words no larger than the limit passed in.

testCases.label: Verify w2vDoesntMatchExercise matches model's doesnt_match output
testCases.description: Ensures that w2vDoesntMatchExercise correctly identifies the out-of-context word using the Word2Vec modelâ€™s doesnt_match function.
